publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3152 Chris Ballance: Belarus Playwrights’ Guild—That the Parliament condemns the government of Belarus for banning the newly formed Belarus Playwrights’ Guild and offers support to all those promoting freedom of expression and association in Belarus.
S2M-3152 Belarus Playwrights’ Guild (lodged on 11 August 2005) Michael Matheson*
